abstract: Green Equity Investors V has bought 17 percent of the grocery chain for $425 million, sending shares up nearly 22 percent.
snippet: Green Equity Investors V has bought 17 percent of the grocery chain for $425 million, sending shares up nearly 22 percent.
lead_paragraph: A private equity firm is buying a 17 percent stake in Whole Foods Market, a much-needed vote of confidence for a chain that is being battered by increased competition and a weak economy.

headline.main: Private Equity Firm Buys 17% of Whole Foods
headline.print_headline: Whole Foods Sells 17% Stake to Private Firm
